import useFetch from "../../hooks/useFetch"; import React from "react"; import "./featured.css"; const Featured = () => { const {data, loading, error} = useFetch("/hotels/countByCity?cities=berlin,madrid,london"); return (
{loading ? ( "Loading please wait..." ) : ( <>

Berlin

{data[0]} properties

Madrid

{data[1]} properties

London

{data[2]} properties

)}
); }; export default Featured;
